name: Don't Panic Pyramid Edition
description:
Don't Panic Pyramids Addition is a treasure collecting survival horror in which you must use your flashlight to navigate the dark mazes and collect as much treasure as you can before escaping to the next procedurally generated dungeon.  

This game was created in 6 days by a team of 3 for Houdini Game Jam 2020

The player loses if they get touched by a mummy or their Panic meter fills up.

Controls: WASD to move, Mouse to look, Hold Space Bar - Collect Loot

Programmer: Insidias

Character Artist: Darklabs

Environment/Prop Artist/Game Designer: Damoniano
